item.title: Touchy Logger
item.description: A few weeks back, me and a friend of mine called Viktor solved a CTF challenge together that fascinated both of us. It was fun, we learned a bunch from it and most importantly: From a pure forensics standpoint, the challenge was applicable to real life. So as a student enrolled in a Bachelor for IT Forensics & Cybercrime, that was really fun & motivating to see. So what challenge am I even talking about?
